alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 11:24PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Smith, south central Marion, western Harrison, northwestern Panola, northern Rusk, southeastern Wood, Upshur and Gregg Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Longview, moving west at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Marshall, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Gilmer, Lindale, Hallsville, Overton, Tatum, Big Sandy, Hawkins, New London, Clarksville City, Beckville, East Mountain, Harleton and Hainesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Smith; Upshur; Wood
